title: Annual Income and Age
question_text:
Consider the table below about annual income and age:
<25,00025,001 < $x$ <50,00050,001 < $x$ < 100,000100,000 < $x$
Age under 303731141
Age 31-5011365123
Age over 508344543


Researchers surveyed working adults and asked them their yearly income and age.
Based on this table, which of the following statements is true?

choices.text:

36
%
of people surveyed are between 31 and 50 years old.

%

It appears from this data that older people earn more money.
